misc

Class Tactics

  • java.lang.Object
    • misc.Tactics

  • public class Tactics
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a miscellaneous class that is used to manage different player's positions in the game field.

    This class stores a set of preset tactics in form of player's positions. These tactics are useful to set predefined team structures for different situations.

    Version:
    v0.1 04/30/2014
    Author:
    Eduard de Torres
